title: New: Moon Bounce – Darn Your Best Frock EP
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/moonbounce.jpg "moonbounce")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7814-new-moon-bounce-darn-your-best-frock-ep/attachment/moonbounce/)

The first thing you’ll notice about **Moon Bounce** is that he has a ridiculously appropriate name. His tones and textures transport the listener to the stars and back, the pieces are layered with samples and synths loop that tangle in the most intricate of ways; it’s fantastically disorientating at times. Since he dropped _Whipped_ over a month ago we’ve heard very little about this young producer. Yesterday however his new EP dropped and what a journey it is. Download it for free bellow.
